name: Beastie Boys Backstage Crew ONLY T-Shirt
description: This t-shirt was given to the local crew during the 2004 Tour supporting the “To The 5 Boroughs” CD. Gilden Heavyweight Active Wear, 100% cotton. Small yellow-gold “Beastie Boys, NYC Broughaha Division” logo on left breast front of black t-shirt. Nothing on the back of the shirt. Classy “CREW-ONLY” Beasties T-shirt. VERY LIMITED QUANTITIES – ONLY AVAILABLE HERE FOR A SHORT TIME. T-Shirt will ship within 24 hours via USPS Priorty Mail – 2 to 3 day service in the US, 6 to 11 days everywhere else.
